definition: to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch

sentences.english: Find out the effects of crocheting a beanie with various types of stitches in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 找出在這個自由視頻鉤針一針各類與豆豆的影響。

sentences.english: Try realistic crocheting with tips from a needlework specialist in this free video on crochet pieces.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試在此免費視頻鉤針作品從現實鉤編刺繡專家提示。

sentences.english: The more weaves the better as you finish attaching your crochet bag strap.
sentences.chinese: 越織越好當您完成您的鉤針包帶附加。

sentences.english: You crocheted Star Trek communicators for the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 你給全家每人都用鉤針編織了一個星球大戰發報機。

sentences.english: Learn crochet techniques such as how to chain stitch in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 學習鉤針技術，比如如何在這個自由連鎖縫合視頻。

sentences.english: Learn how to double crochet in a spiral to crochet beanies in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在一個雙螺旋鉤針以鉤針帽子在此免費視頻。

sentences.english: Learn how to double crochet in a spiral to crochet beanies in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在一個雙螺旋鉤針以鉤針帽子在此免費視頻。

sentences.english: If you have done cross stitch, it is a bit easier to understand some crochet designs.
sentences.chinese: 如果你做了十字繡，這是一點容易理解一些鉤針設計。

sentences.english: When I was 6 years old, my grandma taught me how to crochet.
sentences.chinese: 當我六歲時，我外婆教我怎麼鉤針。

sentences.english: OK. It is that I don't like crochet.
sentences.chinese: 算了吧，我是不喜歡鉤針編制物。

sentences.english: Crocheting in a circle begins many different crochet projects.
sentences.chinese: 開始在一個圓圈鉤編許多不同的鉤針項目。

sentences.english: I learn to use Crochet Chain Link Fence Can anyone tell me how to do?
sentences.chinese: 我學會用鉤針勾花網，誰可以告訴我怎麼辦？

sentences.english: A double crochet stitch is like a half double that is wrapped around the hook one more time.
sentences.chinese: 雙鉤針針就像是一個半雙包一掛鉤周圍更多的時間。

sentences.english: Learn how to stitch the top of a beanie hat in this free video on crocheting beanies.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這個自由縫合視頻鉤針帽子一頂帽子豆豆。

sentences.english: Keep straight edge when creating basket weave crochet patterns.
sentences.chinese: 一直往前走，邊當創建籃子編織鉤針圖案。

sentences.english: Crocheting and sewing can be combined on similar projects.
sentences.chinese: 鉤針編織，縫紉可以合併類似項目。

definition: to help a mother give birth
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
